blogPost.excerpt: Business Banking APIs empower any aggregator, platform, neobank, or marketplace to easily perform banking functions on top of their existing corporate accounts or enable the same for their customers in India.
blogPost.body: Business Banking APIs empower any aggregator, platform, neobank, or marketplace to easily perform banking functions on top of their existing corporate accounts or enable the same for their customers in India.
blogPost.title: Business Banking APIs by Decentro - Perform banking functions on top of corporate accounts
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: 商业银行API使任何聚合商、平台、新银行或市场能够在其现有的企业账户之上轻松地执行银行功能，或为其印度客户实现同样的功能。
localize.tagline: 履行公司账户之上的银行职能

localize.description: 商業銀行API使任何聚合商、平臺、新銀行或市場能夠在其現有的企業賬戶之上輕鬆地執行銀行功能，或爲其印度客戶實現同樣的功能。
localize.tagline: 履行公司賬戶之上的銀行職能
